website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced nut set provides 10 pieces that yield a good range of socket sizes to fit most jobs.
pros: Will work with sizes of nuts ranging from 5/32 to 1/2 inches
Bits slide inside a small storage bar that will fit inside a tool box or a kitchen drawer
Bar makes it easy to organize the bits
Handy set that's good to have close at hand for odd jobs around the house
cons: No hand driver included in the set
No magnetic tip to catch loose nuts

customer_reviews.title: Rusts easily - Not as good as I've come to expect from brand (even cheaper brand) name tools
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my toolbox whenever not in use, still just the moisture in the air, making its way into the toolbox has been enough to rust these... I mean... they still work but common... do better even at this relatively low price point. Your a "Brand name" not some unknown imported from who knows where company...
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Not professional but meets handyman requirements.
customer_reviews.text: * Inexpensive, Handyman quality. * 10 piece set cost about the same as 1 professional nut driver. * The bit bar holds the drivers well. * Without the bit bar I'd soon lose track of the most common drivers. * Has a wide range of drivers: (5/32", 3/16", 7/32", 1/4", 9/32", 5/16", 11/32", 3/8", 7/16", and 1/2" * Straight 1/4" hex shank * Works best in magnetic drive handle. * No locking ring on shank, drivers will fall out of non-magnetic handles. * Not magnetic tip will drop extracted nuts. * Will rust in a humid environment * I've several individual drivers but It's always this set I grab when I'm not sure what size I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kwatson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent for the low price, but the bit didn't last long at all before the edges started to round, and now one of them no longer will effectively drive the screw. The bits need to be made of a higher strength material. Good, cheap option for light use though. Just don't expect them to hold up to repeated or heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you can get them for under $2 like I did
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that they don't have that recessed part that keeps them locked in, they seem to work. You'll need to use them in a drill with a chuck. I wanted to use them in my Craftsman impact with a quick release, but they fell out. Oh well, more tools to collect.....
customer_reviews.author: Stingerssx

customer_reviews.title: Good -low price set for DYI
customer_reviews.text: This was on sell for a little over $2. For a complete set with all the odd size from 5/32 to 1/2". Small enough to easyily to leave in the carry around toolbox. Good for those light duty nuts and bolts without having to bring out the rachet set.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Programmer

customer_reviews.title: They work, not the highest quality.
customer_reviews.text: This set is convenient. I bought it to take advantage of the $10 off $50 Black and Decker promo before Christmas. Everything fits and works but I wish the tolerances were more snug.
customer_reviews.author: A. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Ok Tool
customer_reviews.text: It has no magnet, but it is deep to hold the screw , bolt in. Works.
customer_reviews.author: Patrocle

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for home toolbox...
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the occasional DIY enthusiasts. I purchased these while on sale and they’re a great value for small projects around the house. For professional use, you may want to spend a little more money for a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pearson

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: after sitting in my tool cart for months i finally used it. its decent enough and got the job done
customer_reviews.author: blaster

customer_reviews.title: B&D Nut driver set to be used with drills
customer_reviews.text: Great go driving or removing hex head type screws or bolts. These are not magnetic. But a good product for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Fall out of holder!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because of the convenient holder to keep them together, but they fall out when picking them up!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale, but even it’s original price is really worth it. Usually my hex set is by hand, but this makes my life so much better.

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these for many years, had to get another as I misplaced afew over time

customer_reviews.text: These are built ford tuff. No man these are heavy made very well.

customer_reviews.title: If only they were magnetic...
customer_reviews.text: This little set comes in handy. I like that it has some not too common sizes and can be used with a drill... So far no complaints with looks or quality

customer_reviews.title: All in one.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way everything is in one holder. It works real good.

customer_reviews.title: I definite must if you use your drill driver, or other motorized driver device.
customer_reviews.text: I definite must if you use your drill driver, or other motorized driver device. It's not expensive, and should be in everyone's toolbox/kit. Has most of the more commonly used sizes, and the little holder is nice to keep track of the bits.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I'd trust these to handle a lot of torque but for the price they're a good deal.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for hex head screws.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, did the job. Now I have them for any use in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Handy.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for aa appliance repair. It is not magnetized so I taped the screw to the nut driver. It worked very well.

customer_reviews.title: Great nut driver set
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap nut driver set. I bought this one to replace an identical set I have had for 10+ years. Only reason it needed replaced is because I lost one of the nut drivers. Also the price on amazon is better than any local store.

customer_reviews.text: Work as expected. I used them often. Tend to get misplaced tho...

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price. They tend to fall out of it holder when Un use. Next time I'll get magnetic.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This nut driver set works great! With Amazon, you can't beat the price or the fast shipping. Extremely satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten many opportunities to use this [product but the few times I have it has worked well

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFY CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver, we were so happy with the purchased, we needed the 7/16 Nutdriver for our drill. HURRICANE IRMA, we saved $200 didn't have to pay anyone to put up our Hurricane Shutters.

customer_reviews.title: they strip out pretty quickly though
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. they strip out pretty quickly though. If you need it for one or two quick projects, it works fine. If you want good strong bits, look elsewhere.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, solid. Fits my cordless screwdriver and my drill.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Great nut driver set. All the sizes you'll probably ever need, in a convenient holder. Takes up very little room in the toolbox and fits a power drill for easy driving/removing of next screws. Wish I'd had these years ago.

customer_reviews.title: This would have been perfect for my matrix drill except the groove is not ...
customer_reviews.text: This would have been perfect for my matrix drill except the groove is not catching because the shank is too short and the heel hits befoppre the thing latches onto the groove
customer_reviews.author: Norman G

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Bit-bar makes it convenient to store
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Quality seems fine for my homeowner use. The bit-bar retainer is convenient to keep them in one place instead of searching for them at at the bottom of the toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: DMc

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not that great but it seem can do the job not for ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not that great but it seem can do the job not for frequent use ,ı dont use it yet though.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These do not have the notches in the shank to use in an impact. Drill use only.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and works awesome on impact driver. Nothing more to say, if you have impact driver you need these.

customer_reviews.title: These will work fine if ONLY using a hand driver
customer_reviews.text: These are a little soft (even for their price point). Ran into an issue using these with a small cordless screwdriver (not drill). These will work fine if ONLY using a hand driver.
customer_reviews.author: jc502

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made. I bought them to go with ...

customer_reviews.title: not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: these seem to work fine but I was expecting a notch in the shank so that I could use them in my impact driver. I wish i had realized they did not have one before i purchased overall not bad just not as useful as I was hoping. I knew when i purchased these they were not magnetic, but did not realize how much I liked the magnetic nut drivers. At the price I guess there not bad.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and functionable.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made and the included holder works great. Nothing much to say about well made drivers.

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again when needed.

customer_reviews.title: Better add more $ and switch to bosh/makita drives
customer_reviews.text: Get rusty after about a 3 weeks of usage. Got em 3 times, will not buy again. Better add more $ and switch to bosh/makita drives...

customer_reviews.title: Great Set For The Price...

customer_reviews.title: It won't drive you nuts...
customer_reviews.text: No problems, no worries, no complaints of any kind. Exactly what I required. The right device for the right application.

customer_reviews.title: it is ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok but drill chuck only, they wont lock in a driver, no groove in shaft

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say. Neat holder keeps them all ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Neat holder keeps them all together. Fit into any drill bit. Will tighten or any nut or bolt within its size range.

customer_reviews.title: Black & Decker - affordable quallity

customer_reviews.title: great drivers!

customer_reviews.author: GIV3

customer_reviews.title: For drill use only, it works for that
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these I falsely assumed they would have the detents in the shafts to allow them to be used in cordless impact drivers. These do not. They work great in a drill, but don't fit in the impact driver. Nowhere in the add does it say they have the detents for that use. My mistake. They have been used in drills and work fine there. The drill just dosen't work as well as the driver for my use. If you are using a cordless drill these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love Black & Decker products period. Never bought a bad black & decker product

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: works great with my black and decker 20v drill. haven't had an issue
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Nice little contained kit by great company.
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this without trying them, I grew up for over thirty five years buying black and decker at sears and this I just tested the fit and felt and fondled them and it's nice quality, machined well, snug fit and great price as add on. Plus black and decker if you have a problem has amazing five star customer service just contact their 800 number and they will fix above and beyond expectations to make or keep you as a customer. Not many companies will do what they will and without a headache of arguing or feeling like your in the wrong. Highly recommend their products and company.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but comes at a price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality no doubt. the product has worked great. Perfect size and molded for a great true fit to the bolt head. My only complaint is price. I paid a little over seven dollars here at Amazon. The other day while perusing through the *walmart tools I noticed this product was much cheaper there. I do agree that Amazon is generally always cheaper because I do check prices. I have one of the big stores right down the road less than a mile. I only give it three stars because in a time that every dollar counts, you can pick this item up in town and save several dollars. Sorry Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MelvinB

customer_reviews.title: Good set of nutdrivers

customer_reviews.text: Drivers are fine. The holder will not retain the drivers well enough to be placed loose in tool box. The drivers end up scatter. I am a home owner and do not use the drivers a great deal. I "rigged" a holder for the drivers and holder out of the pacagein

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Nut Driver Set, 10-Piece (71-080)
product_meta.description:
Includes (1) 5/32 in. Nutdriver, (1) 3/16 in. Nutdriver, (1) 7/32 in. Nutdriver, (1) 1/4 in. Nutdriver, (1) 9/32 in. Nutdriver, (1) 5/16 in. Nutdriver, (1) 11/32 in. Nutdriver, (1) 3/8 in. Nutdriver, (1) 7/16 in. Nutdriver, (1) 1/2 in. Nutdriver

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Black and Decker 71-080 10 Piece nutdriver set has the most popular sizes ranging from 5/32-Inch to 1/2-Inch and is organized by a handy bit bar that is ideal for any tool box, pocket or drawer. Driver sizes included are: 5/32-Inch; 3/16-Inch; 7/32-Inch; 1/4; 9/32-Inch; 5/16-Inch; 11/32-Inch; 3/8-Inch; 7/16-Inch; 1/2-Inch.
feature_bullets: This 10 pc Nutdriver Set has the most popular sizes ranging from 5/32 in. to 1/2 in. and is organized by a handy bit bar that is ideal for any tool box, pocket or kitchen drawer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars504 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
